page.title: 04EDUCATION
page.content: There are two schools within our block. Both are within the village of {Brynamman. }Even though both schools are within the same village they are in{two different counties,}one is in the county of{Dyfed}(the school in Upper Brynamman) and the other in{West {Glamorgan}(the school in Lower Brynamman). Education within the block is limited to{Primary level}with both schools catering for the 3-11 age group. Nursery classes, between 3-5 years are on a half day basis only. The language of both schools is{Welsh though English is taught as a second language in all schools in the area. Both schools are housed in pre-war buildings.
